featureArticle.title: GUTS 2-YEAR ANNIVERSARY!!!
featureArticle.content: We celebrated the two-year anniversary of GUTS, and new pictures from BTS of Olivia were posted. GUTS has since become a groundbreaking and critically acclaimed album. Thank you, Olivia, for sharing this album with us.

sideArticles.title: GUTS TOUR BOOK
sideArticles.desc: Olivia Rodrigo has released her GUTS Tour Book, available for pre-order now.

sideArticles.title: YES, SHES ALIVE!!!
sideArticles.desc: New images of Olivia from Owen Gould.

sideArticles.title: CHART UPDATE
sideArticles.desc: Olivia Rodrigo's live performance from Glastonbury has already surpassed 500,000 streams on Spotify.

sideArticles.title: FIRST LOOK: OLIVIA IN LILITH FAIR DOC
sideArticles.desc: Exclusive look at what's brewing internally.

sideArticles.title: GLASTONBURY LIVE VINYL & CD
sideArticles.desc: Olivia has released two variants of her Glastonbury live performance: vinyl and CD. All proceeds go to Doctors Without Borders (MSF).

sideArticles.title: SPOTIFY UPDATE?
sideArticles.desc: Olivia Rodrigo's 'Artist's Pick' playlist is now titled 'Olivia Rodrigo Complete' instead of the Guts World Tour set list.
